Name: Atari User
Publisher: Database Publications Ltd.(later known as Europress)
Topics: Atari, Atari ST when released; its spin-off was Atari ST User

Name: Atari ST User
Publisher: Database Publications Ltd.(later known as Europress)
Topics: Atari ST magazine with hardware focus; merged with ST Action

Name: Commodore User
Topics: Commodore, Vic 20 (at first); renamed CU Amiga in 1990 to concentrate on Commodore Amiga machine.

Name: Computer and Video Games
Topics: Home computing, arcade games, video games.

Name: Computer Gaming World
Topics: PC game topics, occasional console game topics
